jeopardy_round: PUT IT ON DONALD TRUMP'S BILL

(1, 1).clue: It's the "nighttime, sniffling, sneezing, coughing, aching, fever, best sleep you ever got with a cold... medicine"

(5, 2).clue: "Here, let me get out my wallet..." A divorce from this alliteratively named lady cost a mere $2 million

(2, 1).clue: (Drew delivers the clue.)  In my new movie "Music and Lyrics", Hugh Grant plays my love interest; in "50 First Dates" & "The Wedding Singer", I was paired up with this funny actor
